Diego Motors Chupacabra.name: Diego Motors Chupacabra
Diego Motors Chupacabra.description: Compact Groundcar built from recycled parts from older vehicles. Low-tech but high-horse-power.

Grundy.name: Grundy
Grundy.description: Armored industrial looking Compact Grouncar, with a powerful combat plow.

Harriet 100.name: Harriet 100
Harriet 100.description: A classic Roadbike with a more feminine look.

Harvey Merc.name: Harvey Merc
Harvey Merc.description: A classic roadbike, this time with mounted weapons.

Highway Master Artemis.name: Highway Master Artemis
Highway Master Artemis.description: A low-riding Roadbike with retractable glass cover. Has a surpercharge mode that doesn't come with a safety guarantee.

Kaukaz Volkhov.name: Kaukaz Volkhov
Kaukaz Volkhov.description: An armored pickup Compact Groundcar with mounted machine gun. Comes with a bottle of vodka.

Makigai Ebi.name: Makigai Ebi
Makigai Ebi.description: Small but well thought out Compact Groundcar.

Paladin 500.name: Paladin 500
Paladin 500.description: A High Performance Groundcar. Now you can be MadMax. In town. With two mounted Machine Guns.

Quadra Thunder-X.name: Quadra Thunder-X
Quadra Thunder-X.description: A top of the line High Performance Groundcar.

SH-45 Patroller Law.name: SH-45 Patroller Law
SH-45 Patroller Law.description: One seat Gyrocopter. Police version, with mounted Machine Gun.

Street King Combat Vehicle.name: Street King Combat Vehicle
Street King Combat Vehicle.description: A High Performance Groundcar which is large, armored and has a military look.

Tanson Bellhop.name: Tanson Bellhop
Tanson Bellhop.description: A one seat Gyrocopter which can be folded to the size of a large suitcase.

Tanson JetBoy Hoverboard.name: Tanson JetBoy Hoverboard
Tanson JetBoy Hoverboard.description: A hoverboard driven with Athletics Skill. Can't be upgraded.

TetraCorp America Badger Corporate Bus.name: TetraCorp America Badger Corporate Bus
TetraCorp America Badger Corporate Bus.description: A luxurious bus for corporate road trips. Equally ell equipped for work meetings and after meeting drinks.

TetraCorp America MegaHauler.name: TetraCorp America MegaHauler
TetraCorp America MegaHauler.description: Armored truck transport. As much a train as a car.

Zacatzontli Pickup Truck.name: Zacatzontli Pickup Truck
Zacatzontli Pickup Truck.description: A Compact Groundcar equipped for off-road travel.

Zetatech Herakles.name: Zetatech Herakles
Zetatech Herakles.description: AV4 type troop transport, armored and armed.

Zonda Sliver.name: Zonda Sliver
Zonda Sliver.description: A Roadbike with all the gadgets you'd ever need.
